shortdesc.ph: Advanced feature configuration for live transcoding.
Advanced feature configuration for live transcoding.
Advanced feature configuration for transcoding live streaming.
Advanced configuration for transcoding live streaming.

section.p: To use advanced features for live transcoding, please [contact sales](https://www.shengwang.cn/contact-sales/).
To use advanced features for live transcoding, please [contact sales](https://www.shengwang.cn/contact-sales/).
To use advanced transcoding live streaming features, please [contact sales](https://www.shengwang.cn/contact-sales/).
To use advanced features for transcoding live streaming, please [contact sales](https://www.shengwang.cn/contact-sales/).

plentry.pd: The name of the advanced feature for live transcoding, including LBHQ (Low Bitrate High Quality video feature) and VEO (Video Encoder Optimization feature).

Whether to enable the advanced feature for live transcoding:
: Enable the advanced feature for live transcoding.
: (Default) Disable the advanced feature for live transcoding.
Name of the advanced feature for live transcoding, including LBHQ (low-bitrate high-quality video) and VEO (optimized video encoder).

Whether to enable the advanced feature for live transcoding:
: Enable the advanced feature for live transcoding.
: (default) Disable the advanced feature for live transcoding.
The name of the advanced transcoding live streaming feature, including LBHQ (low-bitrate high-definition video) and VEO (optimized video encoder).

Whether to enable the advanced transcoding live streaming feature:
: Enable the advanced transcoding live streaming feature.
: (default) Disable the advanced transcoding live streaming feature.
The name of the advanced transcoding live streaming feature, including LBHQ (low-bitrate high-quality video) and VEO (optimized video encoder).

Whether to enable the advanced transcoding live streaming feature:
: Enables the advanced transcoding live streaming feature.
: (Default) Disables the advanced transcoding live streaming feature.
